publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4901 Karen Whitefield: 150th Anniversary of St Aloysius Parish in Chapelhall—That the Parliament congratulates St Aloysius Parish in Chapelhall on the occasion of its 150th anniversary; recognises that the parish has played an important part in the life of the community of Chapelhall over this period of time; pays tribute to the commitment shown to the community by all of the parish priests, from the first, Father James Milne, to the present, Father Michael Walsh; recognises in particular the important part that the parish has played in the education of young people in the community, and wishes the parish well in its year of celebrations.
S3M-4901 150th Anniversary of St Aloysius Parish in Chapelhall (lodged on 22 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4901 Karen Whitefield: 150th Anniversary of St Aloysius Parish in Chapelhall—That the Parliament congratulates St Aloysius Parish in Chapelhall on the occasion of its 150th anniversary; recognises that the parish has played an important part in the life of the community of Chapelhall over this period of time; pays tribute to the commitment shown to the community by all of the parish priests, from the first, Father James Milne, to the present, Father Michael Walsh; recognises in particular the important part that the parish has played in the education of young people in the community, and wishes the parish well in its year of celebrations. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Hugh Henry*
